extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the world of Old Time Radio! Travel back in time and listen to great radio mysteries, dramas and comedies from the 1930s through the 1970s. Nearly ten thousand episodes from over seventy shows are available, all free of charge.21st PrecinctAldrich FamilyAmos and AndyAmos 'n AndyBarry CraigBoston BlackieBurns and AllenCampbell PlayhouseCBS Mystery TheaterCBS Radio Mystery TheaterCommand PerformanceCounterspyDimension XDimension-XDragnetDuffys TavernDuffy's TavernEscapeFather Knows BestFibber McGee and MollyFlash GordonGangbustersGreen HornetGunsmokeHave Gun Will TravelHopalong CassidyInner SanctumJack BennyLife With LuigiLightning JimLights OutLux Radio TheaterMercury TheaterMy Favorite HusbandNero WolfeNick Carter, Master DetectiveNight BeatNightbeatOur Miss BrooksPhilip MarloweRadio Readers DigestReader's DigestRichard DiamondRocky JordanSam SpadeScreen Guild TheaterSherlock HolmesSix ShooterSpeed Gibson of the International Secret PoliceSupermanSuspenseTales of the Texas RangersThe Adventures of Harry LimeThe Adventures of Phillip MarloweThe Adventures of Rocky JordanThe Campbell PlayhouseThe ClockThe Great GildersleeveThe Green HornetThe Inner SanctumThe Life of RileyThe Life Of RileyThe Lives of Harry LimeThe Lone RangerThe SaintThe Screen Guild TheaterThe ShadowThe Shadow 1937-1939The Shadow 1940-1946The Six ShooterThe WhistlerVic and SadeWeird CircleX Minus OneYours Truly, Johnny Dollar

reviews.title: Wonderful app
reviews.comment: This app is fantastic & has plenty of variety. The instructions are detailed & make the app effortless.
reviews.author: Jeanette Williams

reviews.title: The ONLY OTR app worth having!
reviews.comment: Saves the shows you have listened to so you can listen to them off line, offers you your pick of genre, amazing selection, thousands of titles to choose from!! I love this app! A must have!
reviews.author: Ann Greenfield

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Great app. Quality of sound could be better.
reviews.author: Carlos Knows

reviews.title: LOVE IT BUT PLEASE ADD MYSTERIOUS \"THE TRAVELLER\"
reviews.comment: GREAT APP. BUT IT WOULD B A WHOLE BETTER IT THEY WOULD ADD \"THE MYSTERIOUS TRAVELLER\"  hint....hint... :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: Very extensive playlist of old radio shows.  Easy interface.  Continuous play available, so you can listen to a series without stopping to pick the next one every half hour.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Nice
reviews.comment: Great job, enjoy it very much.  Thanks. Update,got a new tablet November,2012,this app is still great,works perfectly. Still enjoy it very much.  Thanks,again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WONDERFUL!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: 5 stars from me no complaints at all. I love this app,  best app I have downloaded....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Make subscriptions playlists
reviews.comment: Good selection of shows.   Once you setup multiple \"subscriptions\" you should be able to play all subscribed shows/genres sequentially without having to interact after each show. Subscriptions should be considered playlists.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Time passer driving down road
reviews.comment: Love listening to gun smoke etc. Wish there was a way to download multiple at same time while on wifi.
reviews.author: Daniel Dartez

reviews.title: So far so fantastic!
reviews.comment: Simple, decent selection, hours of shows including four of my favorites.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Most used app on phone
reviews.comment: I really enjoy The Six Shooter and Gunsmoke. I wish it had Box 13.
reviews.author: Mark Kettlewell

reviews.title: Awesome and The Best
reviews.comment: I love OTR this app is like my new TV and I can\'t even go to sleep without it anymore..Im 26 and didn\'t grow up with these types of radio programs but I Love em and recommend everyone to give it a listen.Thanks OTR
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dave is the best SRV on the planet.
reviews.comment: This has to be one of the greatest apps in the market and i love it. Thank you Also this Dev. Is The GREATEST. HE IS KIND AND CARING.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Little issues
reviews.comment: Keeps force closing and taking out my volume control. I love this app and would be more than happy to pay for it but not if it\'s going to keep having these issues. I may have to see if there\'s another app :(
reviews.author: K Bradley

reviews.title: Thank you dev :)
reviews.comment: This app has the best sound quality when listening to these old shows. I also love that I can save these shows and transfer them from my phone to my sd card by moving them around in my files. Thanks dev :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!!!
reviews.comment: I may be 29, but, I LOVE Old Time Radio!  So far, it works great! It\'s taking me back to listening to recordings with my parents and grandparents.  Good job!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mick
reviews.comment: Love this app it makes the work day go fast I don\'t know how I lived with out it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: No problems with it at all. And I\'ve been using it for months.
reviews.author: hrdman2luv

reviews.title: Absolutely Wonderful
reviews.comment: I love Love LOVE this app! Gets me thru my worknight every time. If it has any drawback at all, it\'s that the shows are saved locally on your phone and the files (mp3s) are massive. But this is to be expected for 1/2 hour shows and well worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FIX THIS ISSUE PLEASE!!
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app for fans of old time radio.  It just doesn\'t work after the 3rd time I open it. I have to reinstall to make it work. Fix this issue please!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
